content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs per my latest command, I browsed the website https://www.qalamcenter.com/ to find out what types of Arabic courses Qalam wa Lawh offers. Qalam wa Lawh offers group and private Arabic courses, intensive courses, online courses, and immersion programs. They also offer courses for kids, business Arabic courses, and Arabic teacher training programs.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: Qalam wa Lawh offers fully customizable programs in both Modern Standard Arabic (MSA) and Colloquial Modern Arabic (Darija). \n \n Links: ['HOME (https://www.qalamcenter.com)', 'ABOUT US (https://www.qalamcenter.com/about-us)', 'CAMPUS (https://www.qalamcenter.com/campus)', 'GALLERY (https://www.qalamcenter.com/gallery)', 'NEWS (https://www.qalamcenter.com/news)']"}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.ihmadrid.com/en/", "question": "What types of Spanish courses does International House Madrid offer?"}}}'}]
"""
